WaterTable and Drainage are only called if use_aquifer_layer=True and it is false if lower_boundary_condition=2 (bc_zero_flux) which is the CLM5 default.
PerchedLateralFlow and LateralFlowPowerLaw appear to be called in HydrologyDrainage which is called in clm_driver. Where is this described in the tech note?
